lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Mazi ego ki esy, choris skepsi polli
Makrya as petaxoume, kai ela na kanoume
Ti nychta apopse giortini
Apopse as vrethoume
Se kosmous xenous makrynous
Apopse as charoume
Tis ores pou pernoun, kai piso den gyrnoun
Apopse as vrethoume
Se kosmous xenous makrynous
Apopse as charoume
Tis ores pou pernoun, kai piso den gyrnoun
Mazi ego ki esy, protou o ilios vgei
Ti nychta as zisoume, ki ela n’ afisoume
Tis egnoies gi’ avrio to proi
Apopse as vrethoume
Se kosmous xenous makrynous
Apopse as charoume
Tis ores pou pernoun, kai piso den gyrnoun
Fevgei i zoi mas toso viastika
Mazi as ti charoume, protou na ein’ arga
Apopse as vrethoume
Se kosmous xenous makrynous
Apopse as charoume
Tis ores pou pernoun, kai piso den gyrnoun
Apopse as vrethoume
Se kosmous xenous makrynous
Apopse as charoume
Tis ores pou pernoun, kai piso den gyrnoun
